text: Rebecca "Becky" Adlington, OBE (born 17 February 1989) is a retired English freestyle swimmer. She won two gold medals at the 2008 Summer Olympics in the 400 m and 800 m. She won bronze medals in the women's 400 m and 800 m freestyle events in the 2012 Summer Olympics in London. Adlington retired from all competitive swimming on 5 February 2013.Rebecca Adlington: Time right to retire from swimming - BBC Sport ==Early life== Adlington was born in Mansfield, Nottinghamshire. She went to The Brunts School there. In 2013 she was a contestant on I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Great Britain Category:Olympic gold medalists for Great Britain Category:I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! contestants Category:Living people Category:Mansfield Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Officers of the Order of the British Empire Category:Sportspeople from Nottinghamshire Category:British swimmers
title: Rebecca Adlington
